Grand European Tour | Viking River Cruises | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Grand European Tour 15 Days | Budapest to Amsterdam INCLUDES: FREE return flights up to AUD$2,500 per person or receive an AU$2,500 per person, discount in lieu of flights* Available on select 2026 & 2027 sailings. Deal Details Travel Dates Mar - Nov 26 & Apr - Nov 27 Sale Ends Dec 1, 2025 Priced From AUD8,695 per person Enquire Now INCLUDES: FREE return flights up to AUD$2,500 per person or receive an AU$2,500 per person, discount in lieu of flights* Available on select 2026 & 2027 sailings. Description Set sail on a timeless voyage through the cultural and geographic heart of Europe, tracing the winding paths of the Rhine, Main, and Danube Rivers. Over the course of 15 unforgettable days, travel through the Netherlands, Germany, Austria, and Hungary—each offering a tapestry of landscapes, architecture, and stories that have shaped the continent for centuries. From the charming canals of Amsterdam to the regal grandeur of Budapest, this cruise invites you to immerse yourself in the old-world charm and vibrant present of Europe’s most iconic cities and hidden gems. Highlights Marvel at Rhine Valley panoramas from a 900-year-old hilltop castle. Savor Austrian flavors in the vineyard-lined Wachau Valley. Waltz through Vienna’s imperial past and explore its grand architecture. Visit Melk Abbey, a masterpiece of baroque design with stunning frescoes. Reflect in Nuremberg, a city rich in medieval charm and World War II history. Explore UNESCO World Heritage sites, from Regensburg to Cologne and Kinderdijk. Pricing Standard Stateroom (Cat F) from AU$8,695* per person, twin share Based on 30 July 2026 Departure What's Included One complimentary shore excursion in every port of call Free Wi-Fi (connection speed may vary) All onboard meals, featuring regional specialties & always available classics Beer, wine & soft drinks with onboard lunch & dinner 24-hour specialty coffees, teas & bottled water Port taxes & fees Ground transfers with Viking Air purchase Visits to UNESCO Sites Enrichment lectures & Destination Performances Onboard gratuities Itinerary Day 1 Budapest, Hungary Day 2 Budapest, Hungary Day 3 Vienna, Austria Day 4 Vienna, Austria Day 5 Scenic Sailing: Wachau Valley, - Melk, Austria Day 6 Passau, Germany Day 7 Regensburg, Germany Day 8 Scenic Sailing: Main Danube Canal, Germany - Nuremberg, Germany Day 9 Bamberg, Germany Day 10 Wurzburg, Germany Day 11 Wertheim, Germany - Scenic Sailing: Main River, Spessart Day 12 Scenic Sailing: Middle Rhine - Koblenz, Germany Day 13 Cologne, Germany Day 14 Scenic Sailing: Waal & Merwede - Kinderdijk, The Netherlands Day 15 Amsterdam Your Ship: Aboard a Viking Longship Sail in comfort and style aboard one of Viking’s award-winning Longships—engineered specifically for river cruising and thoughtfully designed to bring you closer to the heart of Europe. With its state-of-the-art design, Scandinavian elegance, and spacious public areas, your ship is more than just a vessel—it’s your floating boutique hotel. Each Longship features a serene, understated aesthetic that reflects Viking’s commitment to comfort, functionality, and timeless design. Floor-to-ceiling windows in the lounge and restaurant offer panoramic views of the ever-changing scenery, while the open-air Aquavit Terrace provides a relaxed setting for al fresco dining or sunset cocktails along the riverbanks. Accommodations include a variety of stateroom categories, all with river views—many with full-size verandas or French balconies. Dining on board is a culinary journey of its own, with menus inspired by regional cuisine and international favorites. Enjoy complimentary wine and beer with lunch and dinner, as well as daily cultural enrichment programs, port talks, and live music in the lounge. With no casinos, no children under 18, and no unnecessary distractions, Viking offers a serene, immersive, and destination-focused experience. Whether you’re gliding past the castles of the Rhine, the vineyards of the Wachau, or the bustling quays of Budapest, your Longship ensures every moment on board is as memorable as your time ashore. Terms & Conditions Prices are per person, in Australian dollars and for Australian and New Zealand residents only. They are based on double occupancy and correct at time of printing. Prices include all advertised discounts, and all offers are subject to availability and may be withdrawn at any time. All offers are only valid for new bookings and only on selected departures made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM (AEDT) unless sold out prior. A partially refundable deposit of AU$1,000 per person (in the form of a future cruise voucher less an AU$100 cancellation fee) is required to secure a confirmed reservation within 3 days of booking otherwise reservation may automatically cancel. Once deposit payment has been made, standard cancellation penalties apply. When booking airfares through Viking (including when taking advantage of a special offer that includes air travel), standard airline cancellation fees also apply. Displayed prices indicate the lowest available pricing across all available sailings from 2025 to 2028 and may have different offers applicable from those advertised for the promoted sailing years. Pricing for each itinerary can vary at short notice as availability changes and sailings close for the current season. Complete terms and conditions may be found in the Passenger Ticket Contract.Fly Free Economy Flights up to the value of AU$2,500pp when booking flights with Viking. Fly Free is economy flight(s) for both guests up to the value of AU$2,500 per person (pp) to/from Australia/New Zealand. If the flight cost exceeds AU$2,500pp the guest will cover the difference. If flights are cheaper than AU$2,500pp the unused portion of the air funds will be waived and cannot be transferred towards any other portion of the booking or any other person. A guest can use the AU$2,500pp to instead upgrade to business class or premium economy (booked through Viking) with AU$2,500pp off the buisness/premium economy airfare and the difference to be covered by the guest. Upgrade flight cost difference is to be paid at the time of flight booking. Any flight cost difference is to be paid at the time of flight booking. Applicable if flights are booked through Viking and must be booked in conjunction with a selected 2026/2027/2028 Viking River cruise. Flights are Viking’s choice of airline for selected major gateways in NZ: AKL/CHC/WLG. Guest must return their air form to Viking within 14 business days of receiving request for flights, otherwise Viking reserve the right to remove the free air promo and apply the respective in lieu of flights discount. Valid on bookings made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM (AEDT). Guest may not request to change to flights included promotion post campaign end date of 01 December 2025. Viking will reach out to you or your travel advisor once flights are in the date range, at this point you may nominate your preferred departure/arrival dates. Both guests must be on the same airline booking (PNR) and fly together in both directions. Solo guests for River can use up to AU$5,000 towards their flights. Any unused portion of the air funds will be waived and cannot be transferred towards any other portion of the booking or any other person or booking. Please use code FFR25 to activate the Fly Free offer when booking online or via the Contact Centre. If no code is selected when booking via online, the Fly Free offer will be applied. Save AU$2,500pp and book flights independently. Guests are eligible to get a discount of AU$2,500 per person (pp) off the cruise fare at the time of booking in lieu of the Free Economy Class flights. Solo guests for River are eligible to get a discount of AU$5,000 per booking off the cruise fare in lieu of the free flights. Guests book their own flights independently of Viking. Valid on bookings made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM (AEDT).Guest may not request to change to flights included promotion post campaign end date of 01 December 2025. Please use code CRD25 to activate the In Lieu of Flights offer when booking online or via the Contact Centre.If no code is selected when booking via online, the Fly Free offer will be applied. CRUISE ONLY OFFER - SAVE UP TO 30% on selected Viking 2025 River Voyages Applies to any new booking made between 02 September - 01 December 2025 at 7PM AEDT on a 2025 Viking River voyage. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
